regions.name: The City
regions.founded: Union of Village A and Village B
regions.lore: Formed through the unification of Village A and Village B, The City stands as the heart of the Empire. It is the seat of the Twin Crowns, the center of industry, law, and ceremony, and the foundation upon which Imperial authority is built.
regions.contribution: Serves as the administrative, industrial, and logistical core of the Empire, coordinating production, governance, and expansion across all regions.
regions.relations: Seat of the Twin Crowns; central authority over all regions of the Empire.

regions.name: The Third Village
regions.founded: Upon the Birth of the Empire
regions.lore: Discovered during Imperial exploration, this village became the first to accept the Imperial Proposal, transforming cooperation into sovereignty.
regions.contribution: Operates assigned production infrastructure and supplies designated materials to the Capital.
regions.relations: Foundational ally of The City; loyal to the Twin Crowns.
